mapper.select: select WLUNITTK as id, WLPARENTUNITTK as parentId, WLUNITNAME as unitName, BPDIVISIONGROUP_DK as divisionGroupId, BPORGREGION_DK as regionId, decode(DUODR_FLAG, 'N', 0, 1) as isDuodr, WorkloadRate, StaffCountFact, StaffCountDeltaCnt, VacancyCnt, DecretVacancyCnt, HFCriterionCnt, HFCriterionW4Cnt, HFCriterionW8Cnt, NonSLAStaffCnt, RelocationRate, SLAFactValueDoubleCnt as slaFactValueDoubleCnt, Lvl from table(pkg_workload_api.get_bpdivision_stat( p_DateTo => #{endDate}, p_RPTypeID => #{rpTypeId}, p_BPDIVISIONGROUPDK => #{divisionGroupId}, p_BPORGREGIONDK => #{regionId}, p_DuodrRegDK => #{duodrReg}, p_InnerEndProductId => #{innerEndProductId} ))

select calcdate, wlunittk as unitId, workloadrate, StaffCountCalc, staffcountfact, StaffCountFact2, calcdate_year as timeUnitYear, calcdate_prd_num as timeUnitPrdNum from table(pkg_workload_api.get_WL_dynamics( p_DateTo => #{endDate}, p_WeekCnt => #{weekCount}, p_RPTypeID => #{rpTypeId}, p_BPDIVISIONGROUPDK => #{divisionGroupId}, p_BPORGREGIONDK => #{regionId}, p_DuodrRegDK => #{duodrReg} ))

select calcDate, wlUnitTk as unitId, wlParentUnitTk as parentUnitId, wlUnitName as unitName, bpdivisiongroup_dk as divisionGroupId, bpOrgRegion_dk as regionId, bpiep_rate as iepRate, bpiep_cnt as iepCount, staffcountCalc, calcdate_year as timeUnitYear, calcdate_prd_num as timeUnitPrdNum from table(pkg_workload_api.get_ESU_dynamics( p_DateTo => #{endDate}, p_WeekCnt => #{weekCount}, p_RPTypeID => #{rpTypeId}, p_BPDIVISIONGROUPDK => #{divisionGroupId}, p_BPORGREGIONDK => #{regionId}, p_InnerEndProductId => #{innerEndProductId}, p_DuodrRegDK => #{duodrReg} ))

select calcdate, wlunittk as id, wlunitname as unitName, staffCountFact, calcdate_year as timeUnitYear, calcdate_prd_num as timeUnitPrdNum from table(pkg_workload_api.get_StaffCnt_dynamics( p_DateTo => #{endDate}, p_Slice => #{sliceCode}, p_WeekCnt => #{weekCount}, p_BPDivisionGroupDK => #{divisionGroupId}, p_BPOrgRegionDK => #{regionId}, p_RPTypeID => #{rpTypeId}, p_DuodrRegDK => #{duodrReg} ))

select BpinnerendProductCcode, BpinnerendProductName, BporgRegionCcode, BporgRegionName, BpDivisionGroupCcode, BpDivisionGroupName, NormativeMinutes, EffectifFrom , EffectifTo from table(pkg_workload_api.get_BpiepnormValue())
select Ccode, Name, NumberOfWeek, YearWeek , ValueDay, WorkminCnt from table(pkg_workload_api.get_BpworkWeek())

select ValueDay, BpDivisionGroupCcode, BpinnerendProductName, BpinnerendProductCcode, PortfolioFlag, BporgRegionCcode, round(NormativeMinutes,4) NormativeMinutes , round(TotalbpiepquantityCnt,4) TotalbpiepquantityCnt , round(TotallaborvalueCnt,4) TotallaborvalueCnt , round(Worktime4staffunitCnt,4) Worktime4staffunitCnt , round(EstimatedstaffunitCnt,4) EstimatedstaffunitCnt from table(pkg_workload_api.get_ConvertCount())

select ValueDay , BpdivisiongroupNameLvl1, BpdivisiongroupNameLvl2 , BpdivisiongroupNameLvl3 , BpDivisionGroupCcode, BporgRegionCcodeLvl2 , BporgRegionCcodeLvl3 , TotalfactvalueCnt, SlafactvalueCnt, SlafactvaluedoubleCnt, SlafactvacancyCnt, SlafactvacancytempCnt, NoslafactvalueCnt, NoslafactvaluedoubleCnt, NoslafactvacancyCnt, NoslafactvacancytempCnt, EstimatedstaffunitW8Cnt, Quartile1W8Cnt, Quartile3W8Cnt, LowlimitW8Cnt, HighlimitW8Cnt, CriteriaW8Cnt, Quartile1W4Cnt, Quartile3W4Cnt, LowlimitW4Cnt, HighlimitW4Cnt, CriteriaW4Cnt, TotalcriteriaCnt, WorkloadFactor from table(pkg_workload_api.get_Workload())
